full_text: TIPORTNT NSRICTIONS The First Service employee to come in contact with this alien should personally serve the attached Order to Show Cause (OSC), form T 221, which was sent to the alien by certified mail, but returned by the Post Office as undeliverable. The alien is not under deportation proceedings until the OSC is properly served. To serve the OSC, complete the Certificate of Service (example stamped below) on page 2 of both the original and file copy of the OSC (fastened on the left side of file) and hand deliver the attached OSC packet to the alien. BE SURE TO ORTAIN ALTENS'S CURRENT ADDRESS. Cross out the old address on the original and file copy of the OSC and pen in the current address. Upon proper completion of service, forward the file to Deportation for docket control. Note: You may serve OSC's for immediate family members to the head of household. In such cases, note below the Certificate of Service the name and relationship of the person to whom the OSC was served. ( SAMPLE ) CERTIFICATE OF SERVICE This order and notice were served by me on, 3/20/89 (date) in the following manner: by hand Jose (signature Garcia and title of employee IIO officer) or
